tha-ap300:0.3_0: He is praised by the senior monks, who sometimes go to the junior,
tha-ap300:1.4_0: the world’s Elder, and the world does not clever.
tha-ap300:2.2_0: as a service of the first member,
tha-ap300:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap300:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap300:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sarabha.
tha-ap300:6.1_0: the eighth round of the senior monks.
